conversation.content:
Based on the list of intents above, your task is going to be to classify a statement and fill any slots under that intent based on the content of the statement. If you come across a slot that has no direct association in the statement, fill it with "0". Your response should be in nested python dictionaries that match the form of the intent list (JSON). If you find that you are taking too long, take a break. Make sure that all you are only submitting correct answers. IMPORTANT: only use the intent id to refer to the intent, not the description. Similarly, only refer to the slot_id, never the name. The dictionaries should also follow the structure of:

"intent": <id>,
"slots":
{
slotID: value
...
}

Statement:


"We need a two-hour leadership training session for our intermediate-level employees in the marketing department next Thursday."
